create or replace procedure B31_RPT_SP (REPORT_DATE VARCHAR2)
IS
----30-SEP-2020--
---VARARIBLE DECLARE

V_REPORT_DUE_DATE DATE := Add_Months( Last_day (V_REPORT_DATE), +3);
V_REPORT_DUE_DATE DATE := Add_Months( Last_day (V_REPORT_DATE), -3)+1;

V_DC1R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC1R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC1R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC1R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC1R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC1R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC1R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC1R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
--
V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;
V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;
V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

--IF(V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED>0)
--THEN V_DC1R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--ELSE
-- V_DC1R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--
--END IF;
--WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED COLUMN
IF(V_DC1R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC1R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC1R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES1:=V_DC1R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES1:=ABS(V_DC1R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC1R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES1 - V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC1R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC1R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC1R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES2:=V_DC1R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES2:=ABS(V_DC1R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC1R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES2 - V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;


IF(V_DC1R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC1R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC1R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC1R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC1R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC1R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC1R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC1R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC1R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC1R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC1R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC1R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC1_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC1R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC1R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC1R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC1R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC1R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC1R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC1R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC1R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC1R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC1R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC1R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC1R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC1R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC1R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC1R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC1R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC1R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC1R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC1R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC1R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC1R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC1R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC1R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC1R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC1R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC1R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC1R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC1R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC1R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC1R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC1R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC1R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC1R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC1R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC1R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC1R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC1R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC1R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC1R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC1R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC1R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC1R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC1R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC1R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC1R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC1R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC1R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC1R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC1R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC1R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC1R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC1R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC1R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC1R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC1R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC1R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC1R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC1R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC1R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC1R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC1R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC1R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC1R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC1R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC1R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC1R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC1R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC1R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC1R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC1R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC1R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC1R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC1R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC1R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC1R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC1R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC1R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC1R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC1R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC1R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC1R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC1R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC1R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC1R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC1R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC1R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC1R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC1R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC1R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC1R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC1R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC1R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC1R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;


--DC2
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R7_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R4_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R5_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R6_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R13_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R11_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R12_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R17_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R18_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R19_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R20_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R21_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R22_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R23_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R24_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R7_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R4_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R5_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R6_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R13_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R11_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R12_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R17_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R18_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R19_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC2R20_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

V_DC2R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC2R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC2R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC2R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;

V_DC2R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
--
V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;
V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;
V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

--IF(V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED>0)
--THEN V_DC2R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--ELSE
-- V_DC2R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--
--END IF;
--WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED COLUMN
IF(V_DC2R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC2R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC2R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES1:=V_DC2R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES1:=ABS(V_DC2R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC2R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES1 - V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC2R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC2R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC2R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES2:=V_DC2R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES2:=ABS(V_DC2R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC2R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES2 - V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;


IF(V_DC2R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC2R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC2R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC2R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC2R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC2R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC2R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC2R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC2R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC2R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC2R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC2R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC2_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC2R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC2R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC2R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC2R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC2R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC2R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC2R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC2R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC2R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC2R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC2R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC2R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC2R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC2R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC2R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC2R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC2R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC2R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC2R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC2R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC2R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC2R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC2R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC2R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC2R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC2R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC2R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC2R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC2R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC2R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC2R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC2R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC2R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC2R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC2R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC2R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC2R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC2R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC2R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC2R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC2R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC2R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC2R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC2R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC2R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC2R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC2R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC2R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC2R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC2R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC2R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC2R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC2R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC2R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC2R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC2R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC2R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC2R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC2R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC2R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC2R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC2R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC2R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC2R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC2R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC2R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC2R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC2R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC2R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC2R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC2R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC2R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC2R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC2R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC2R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC2R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC2R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC2R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC2R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC2R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC2R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC2R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC2R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC2R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC2R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC2R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC2R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC2R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;



--DC3
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R7_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R4_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R5_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R6_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R13_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R11_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R12_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R17_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC3R18_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC3R23_TOTAL_POSITION_LONG*0.0060;
V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC3R24_TOTAL_POSITION_LONG*0.0060;
--

V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC3R24_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT*0.0060;
--

V_DC3R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC3R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC3R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC3R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
--
V_DC3R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC3R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC3R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC3R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;

V_DC3R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;

V_DC3R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
--

V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;
V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

--IF(V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED>0)
--THEN V_DC3R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--ELSE
-- V_DC3R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--
--END IF;
--WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED COLUMN
IF(V_DC3R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC3R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC3R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES1:=V_DC3R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES1:=ABS(V_DC3R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC3R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES1 - V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC3R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC3R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC3R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES2:=V_DC3R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES2:=ABS(V_DC3R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC3R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES2 - V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;


IF(V_DC3R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

ELSE
 V_DC3R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

THEN V_DC3R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC3R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC3R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC3R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC3R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC3R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC3R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC3R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC3R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC3R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC3R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC3_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC3R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC3R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC3R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC3R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC3R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC3R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC3R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC3R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC3R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC3R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC3R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC3R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC3R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC3R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC3R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC3R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC3R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC3R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC3R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC3R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC3R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC3R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC3R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC3R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC3R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC3R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC3R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC3R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC3R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC3R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC3R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC3R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC3R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC3R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC3R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC3R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC3R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC3R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC3R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC3R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC3R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC3R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC3R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC3R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC3R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC3R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC3R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC3R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC3R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC3R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC3R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC3R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC3R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC3R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC3R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC3R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC3R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC3R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC3R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC3R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC3R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC3R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC3R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC3R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC3R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC3R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC3R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC3R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC3R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC3R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC3R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC3R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC3R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC3R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC3R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC3R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC3R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC3R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC3R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC3R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC3R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC3R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC3R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC3R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC3R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC3R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC3R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC3R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;

V_DC4R20_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT:=V_DC4R20_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC4R20_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC4R20_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R21_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT:=V_DC4R21_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC4R21_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC4R21_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R22_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT:=V_DC4R22_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC4R22_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC4R22_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R23_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT:=V_DC4R23_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC4R23_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC4R23_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R24_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT:=V_DC4R24_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC4R24_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC4R24_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R25_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT:=V_DC4R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC4R25_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC4R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;

V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC4R4_TOTAL_POSITION_LONG*0.01;
V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC4R5_TOTAL_POSITION_LONG*0.01;

V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC4R13_TOTAL_POSITION_LONG*0.0075;

V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R20_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT*0.0060;
V_DC4R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R21_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT*0.0060;

V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R23_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT*0.0060;
V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R24_TOTAL_POSITION_SHORT*0.0060;
--
V_DC4R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC4R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC4R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC4R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC4R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
--
V_DC4R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;

V_DC4R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;

V_DC4R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;

V_DC4R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;

V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;
V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

--IF(V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED>0)
--THEN V_DC4R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--ELSE
-- V_DC4R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--
--END IF;
--WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED COLUMN
IF(V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC4R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC4R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES1:=V_DC4R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES1:=ABS(V_DC4R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC4R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES1 - V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC4R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC4R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC4R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES2:=V_DC4R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES2:=ABS(V_DC4R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC4R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES2 - V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;


IF(V_DC4R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE

END IF;

THEN V_DC4R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

THEN V_DC4R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC4R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC4R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC4R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC4R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC4R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC4R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC4R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC4R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC4R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC4R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC4_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC4R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC4R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC4R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC4R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC4R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC4R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC4R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC4R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC4R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC4R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC4R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC4R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC4R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC4R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC4R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC4R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC4R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC4R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC4R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC4R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC4R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC4R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC4R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC4R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC4R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC4R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC4R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC4R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC4R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC4R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC4R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC4R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC4R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC4R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC4R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC4R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC4R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC4R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC4R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC4R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC4R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC4R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC4R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC4R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC4R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC4R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC4R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC4R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC4R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC4R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC4R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC4R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC4R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC4R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC4R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC4R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC4R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC4R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC4R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC4R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC4R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC4R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC4R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC4R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC4R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC4R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC4R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC4R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC4R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC4R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC4R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC4R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC4R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC4R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC4R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC4R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC4R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC4R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC4R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC4R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC4R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC4R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC4R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC4R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC4R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC4R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC4R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;



--DC5

V_DC5R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC5R17_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC5R18_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC5R19_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC5R20_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC5R21_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC5R22_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC5R23_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC5R24_DEBT_SEC_LONG;

V_DC5R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC5R17_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC5R18_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC5R19_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC5R20_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC5R21_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC5R22_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC5R23_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC5R24_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;

V_DC5R8_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC5R4_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC5R5_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC5R6_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC5R7_INT_RATE_SHORT;

V_DC5R14_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC5R11_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R12_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R13_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC5R25_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC5R17_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R18_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R19_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R20_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R21_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R22_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R23_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC5R24_OPTIONS_LONG;

V_DC5R14_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC5R11_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R12_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R13_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC5R25_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC5R17_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R18_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R19_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R20_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R21_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R22_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R23_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC5R24_OPTIONS_SHORT;

+V_DC5R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC5R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC5R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC5R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC5R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC5R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC5R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC5R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC5R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC5R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC5R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC5R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC5R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC5R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC5R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC5R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC5R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC5R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC5R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC5R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC5R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC5R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC5R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC5R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC5R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC5R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC5R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC5R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC5R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC5R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC5R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC5R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC5R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC5R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC5R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC5R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC5R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC5R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC5R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC5R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC5R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC5R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC5R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC5R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC5R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC5R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC5R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC5R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC5R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC5R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC5R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC5R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC5R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC5R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC5R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC5R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC5R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC5R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC5R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC5R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC5R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC5R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC5R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC5R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC5R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC5R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC5R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC5R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC5R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC5R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC5R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;


--DC6

V_DC6R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC6R17_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R18_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R19_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R20_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R21_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R22_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R23_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R24_DEBT_SEC_LONG;

V_DC6R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC6R4_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R5_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R6_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R7_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC6R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC6R11_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R12_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R13_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC6R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC6R17_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R18_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R19_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R20_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R21_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R22_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R23_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R24_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;

V_DC6R14_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC6R11_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R12_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R13_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC6R25_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC6R17_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R18_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R19_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R20_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R21_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R22_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R23_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R24_INT_RATE_LONG;

V_DC6R8_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC6R4_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R5_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R6_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R7_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC6R14_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC6R11_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R12_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R13_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC6R25_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC6R17_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R18_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R19_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R20_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R21_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R22_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R23_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R24_INT_RATE_SHORT;

V_DC6R8_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC6R4_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R5_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R6_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R7_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC6R14_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC6R11_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R12_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R13_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC6R25_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC6R17_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R18_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R19_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R20_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R21_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R22_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R23_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R24_OPTIONS_LONG;

V_DC6R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC6R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC6R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC6R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC6R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC6R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC6R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC6_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC6R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC6_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC6R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC6R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC6_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC6R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC6R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC6R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC6R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC6R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC6R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC6R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC6R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC6R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC6R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC6R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC6R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC6R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC6R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC6R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC6R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC6R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC6R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC6R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC6R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC6R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC6R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC6R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC6R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC6R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC6R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC6R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC6R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC6R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC6R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC6R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC6R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC6R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC6R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC6R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC6R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC6R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC6R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC6R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC6R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC6R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC6R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC6R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC6R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC6R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC6R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC6R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC6R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC6R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC6R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC6R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC6R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC6R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC6R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC6R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC6R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC6R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC6R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC6R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC6R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC6R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC6R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC6R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC6R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC6R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC6R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC6R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC6R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC6R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC6R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC6R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC6R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC6R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC6R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC6R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC6R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC6R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC6R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC6R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC6R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC6R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC6R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC6R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC6R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC6R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC6R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC6R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC6R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC6R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC6R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC6R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC6R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC6R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC6R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC6R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC6R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC6R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC6R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC6R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC6R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC6R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;



--DC7

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R21_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R6_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R11_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R12_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R17_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R20_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R21_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R22_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R23_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R24_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R7_INT_RATE_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R4_INT_RATE_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R5_INT_RATE_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R6_INT_RATE_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R4_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R5_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R6_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R13_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R18_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R21_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R22_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R23_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R4_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R5_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R6_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R13_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R11_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R12_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R17_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R18_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R19_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R20_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R21_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R22_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R23_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC7R24_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

V_DC7R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC7R4_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R5_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R6_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R7_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC7R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC7R11_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R12_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R13_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC7R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC7R17_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R18_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R19_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R20_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R21_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R22_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R23_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R24_DEBT_SEC_LONG;

--WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED COLUMN

THEN V_DC7R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC7R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

+V_DC7R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC7R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

THEN V_DC7_WITHIN_ZONES1:=V_DC7R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;

 V_DC7_WITHIN_ZONES1:=ABS(V_DC7R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);

 V_DC7R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC7R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC7R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC7R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC7R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC7R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC7R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC7R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC7R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC7R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC7R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC7R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC7R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC7R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC7R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC7R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC7R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC7R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC7R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC7R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC7R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC7R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC7R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC7R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC7R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC7R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC7R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC7R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC7R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC7R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC7R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC7R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC7R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC7R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC7R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC7_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC7R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC7_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC7R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC7R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC7_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC7R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC7R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC7R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC7R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC7R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC7R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC7R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC7R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC7R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC7R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC7R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC7R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC7R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC7R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC7R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC7R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC7R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC7R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC7R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC7R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC7R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC7R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC7R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC7R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC7R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC7R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC7R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC7R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC7R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC7R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC7R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC7R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC7R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC7R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC7R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC7R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC7R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC7R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC7R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC7R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC7R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC7R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC7R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC7R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC7R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC7R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC7R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC7R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC7R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC7R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC7R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC7R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC7R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC7R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC7R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC7R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC7R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC7R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC7R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC7R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC7R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC7R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC7R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC7R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC7R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC7R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC7R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC7R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC7R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC7R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC7R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC7R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC7R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC7R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC7R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC7R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC7R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC7R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC7R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC7R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC7R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC7R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC7R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC7R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC7R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC7R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC7R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC7R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC7R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC7R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC7R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC7R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC7R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC7R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC7R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC7R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC7R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC7R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC7R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;


--DC8

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R12_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R17_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R18_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R20_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R21_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R22_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R23_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
