SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R13_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R11_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R12_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R17_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R19_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R20_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R21_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R22_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R23_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R6_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R13_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R18_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R19_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R21_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R22_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R23_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R24_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R4_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R5_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R6_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC8R13_OPTIONS_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

--IF(V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED>0)
--THEN V_DC8R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--ELSE
-- V_DC8R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--
--END IF;
--WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED COLUMN
IF(V_DC8R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC8R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC8R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES1:=V_DC8R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES1:=ABS(V_DC8R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC8R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES1 - V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC8R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC8R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC8R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES2:=V_DC8R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES2:=ABS(V_DC8R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC8R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES2 - V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;


IF(V_DC8R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC8R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC8R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC8R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC8R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC8R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC8R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC8R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC8R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC8R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC8R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC8R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC8_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC8R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC8R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC8R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC8R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC8R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC8R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC8R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC8R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC8R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC8R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC8R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC8R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC8R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC8R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC8R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC8R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC8R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC8R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC8R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC8R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC8R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC8R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC8R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC8R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC8R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC8R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC8R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC8R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC8R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC8R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC8R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC8R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC8R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC8R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC8R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC8R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC8R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC8R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC8R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC8R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC8R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC8R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC8R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC8R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC8R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC8R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC8R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC8R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC8R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC8R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC8R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC8R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC8R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC8R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC8R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC8R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC8R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC8R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC8R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC8R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC8R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC8R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC8R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC8R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC8R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC8R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC8R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC8R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC8R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC8R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC8R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC8R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC8R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC8R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC8R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC8R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC8R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC8R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC8R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC8R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC8R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC8R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC8R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC8R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC8R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC8R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC8R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC8R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC8R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC8R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC8R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC8R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC8R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;


--DC9

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R20_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R21_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R6_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R13_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R11_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R12_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R19_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R20_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R21_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R22_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R23_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R22_INT_RATE_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R23_INT_RATE_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R24_INT_RATE_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R7_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC9R4_OPTIONS_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

--WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED COLUMN
IF(V_DC9R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC9R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC9R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES1:=V_DC9R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES1:=ABS(V_DC9R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC9R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES1 - V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC9R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC9R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC9R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES2:=V_DC9R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES2:=ABS(V_DC9R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC9R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES2 - V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;


IF(V_DC9R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC9R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC9R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC9R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC9R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC9R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC9R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC9R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC9R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC9R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC9R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC9R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC9_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC9R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC9R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC9R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC9R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC9R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC9R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC9R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC9R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC9R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC9R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC9R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC9R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC9R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC9R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC9R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC9R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC9R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC9R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC9R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC9R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC9R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC9R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC9R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC9R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC9R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC9R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC9R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC9R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC9R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC9R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC9R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC9R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC9R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC9R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC9R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC9R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC9R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC9R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC9R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC9R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC9R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC9R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC9R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC9R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC9R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC9R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC9R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC9R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC9R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC9R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC9R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC9R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC9R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC9R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC9R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC9R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC9R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC9R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC9R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC9R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC9R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC9R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC9R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC9R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC9R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC9R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC9R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC9R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC9R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC9R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC9R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC9R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC9R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC9R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC9R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC9R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC9R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC9R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC9R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC9R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC9R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC9R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC9R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC9R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC9R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC9R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC9R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC9R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC9R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC9R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC9R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC9R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC9R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC9R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC9R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC9R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC9R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC9R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC9R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;

--
--DC10
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R7_DEBT_SEC_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R6_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R13_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R11_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R12_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R17_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R18_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R19_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R20_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R21_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R22_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R23_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R24_DEBT_SEC_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R7_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R4_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R5_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R6_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R13_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R11_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R12_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R17_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R18_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R19_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R20_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R21_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R22_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R23_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;
SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R24_INT_RATE_LONG	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT	COUNT	(*)	INTO	V_DC10R7_INT_RATE_SHORT	FROM	TRAN_MASTER_DETAIL	WHERE	REPORT_DATE	=	V_REPORT_DATE;

V_DC10R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC10R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC10R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC10R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC10R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC10R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
--
V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;
V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;
V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

--IF(V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED>0)
--THEN V_DC10R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--ELSE
-- V_DC10R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;
--
--END IF;
--WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED COLUMN
IF(V_DC10R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R4_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R5_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R6_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R7_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R4_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R5_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC10R6_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R7_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC10R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES1:=V_DC10R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES1:=ABS(V_DC10R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC10R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES1 - V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC10R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R11_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R12_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R13_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R13_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC10R12_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R11_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC10R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES2:=V_DC10R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES2:=ABS(V_DC10R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC10R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES2 - V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;


IF(V_DC10R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R17_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R18_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R19_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R20_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R21_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R22_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R23_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;

IF(V_DC10R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=ABS(V_DC10R24_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R17_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC10R18_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R19_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC10R20_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R21_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC10R22_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R23_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC10R24_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

IF(V_DC10R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT>V_DC10R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG)
THEN V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES3:=V_DC10R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG ;
ELSE
 V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES3:=ABS(V_DC10R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT);
END IF;
V_DC10R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:= V_DC10_WITHIN_ZONES3 - V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

V_DC10R28_DEBT_SEC_LONG:=V_DC10R8_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC10R14_DEBT_SEC_LONG+V_DC10R25_DEBT_SEC_LONG;
V_DC10R28_DEBT_SEC_SHORT:=V_DC10R8_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC10R14_DEBT_SEC_SHORT+V_DC10R25_DEBT_SEC_SHORT;
V_DC10R28_INT_RATE_LONG:=V_DC10R8_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC10R14_INT_RATE_LONG+V_DC10R25_INT_RATE_LONG;
V_DC10R28_INT_RATE_SHORT:=V_DC10R8_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC10R14_INT_RATE_SHORT+V_DC10R25_INT_RATE_SHORT;
V_DC10R28_OPTIONS_LONG:=V_DC10R8_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC10R14_OPTIONS_LONG+V_DC10R25_OPTIONS_LONG;
V_DC10R28_OPTIONS_SHORT:=V_DC10R8_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC10R14_OPTIONS_SHORT+V_DC10R25_OPTIONS_SHORT;
V_DC10R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG:=V_DC10R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC10R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG+V_DC10R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_LONG;
V_DC10R28_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT:=V_DC10R8_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC10R14_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT+V_DC10R25_WEIGHTED_POSITIONS_SHORT;
V_DC10R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC10R29_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+
V_DC10R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;

--BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED AND UNMATCHED column
IF(V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC10R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;


IF(V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0 AND V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0 AND V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;
--R15
IF(V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED +V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R14
IF(V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC10R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R14_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC10R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

--R32
IF(V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0)
THEN V_DC10R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED - V_DC10R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED +V_DC10R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
END IF;

V_DC10R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED:=V_DC10R25_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+
V_DC10R14_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED+V_DC10R8_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED;

IF(V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED > 0 AND V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED > 0) 
OR (V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED < 0 AND V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED < 0)
THEN V_DC10R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=0 ;
ELSE
 V_DC10R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=LEAST(ABS(V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_UNMATCHED), 
 ABS(V_DC10R8_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED));
END IF;

V_DC10R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED:=V_DC10R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED+V_DC10R25_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED
+V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED;


V_DC10R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC10R28_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED;
V_DC10R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.05;
V_DC10R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC10R9_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC10R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC10R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC10R15_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC10R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;
V_DC10R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC10R26_WITHIN_BANDS_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC10R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.3;

V_DC10R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC10R9_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC10R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;
V_DC10R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC10R15_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC10R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE*0.4;

V_DC10R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC10R26_BETWEEN_ZONES_MATCHED);
V_DC10R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;
V_DC10R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=ABS(V_DC10R28_BETWEEN_ZONES_UNMATCHED);
V_DC10R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE* 1;

V_DC10R38_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE:=V_DC10R37_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC10R36_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC10R35_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE + V_DC10R34_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC10R33_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+
V_DC10R32_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+ V_DC10R31_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE+V_DC10R30_NET_POS_CAP_CHARGE;

V_DC10R38_CAPITAL_CHARGE:=V_DC10R37_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC10R36_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC10R35_CAPITAL_CHARGE + V_DC10R34_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC10R33_CAPITAL_CHARGE+
V_DC10R32_CAPITAL_CHARGE+ V_DC10R31_CAPITAL_CHARGE+V_DC10R30_CAPITAL_CHARGE;
